WRITING.TEXT: Would love to partner with you! Great idea! PM me your name would love to play
I am proud of you too :)
I would love for Riot to be a part of this. And thanks :)
I'm going try and spam amumu when i can with the surprise party skin :)
wow thank you. That means so much! :)
Thank you I am just an average guy :)
lol Rito pls and thank you :)
Exactly what i hope to happen!!!!! Great job and thanks! :)
Thanks for contributing! Just being positive is more than enough! And I'm hoping that too :)
Thanks wishing you the best too :)
Thanks I'm just trying to help. And the thought is more than enough :)
Welcome!!!! :)
It is getting there thank you! :)
Thank you I am fighting each day! I just want people to get help. Best of luck to you too :)
I am thank you :)
That's the idea! and just being positive is more than enough payment. Hope you are well too :)
Oh wow thanks I'm flatterred! And i will try :)
Thanks and i hope good comes to you too
the upvotes don't matter. What matters is that we are already helping people just by showing the positivty that exists.
I understand, trust me sometimes i have the urge to rage, but i try and just approach it calmly. Good luck to you too! :)
Wow thank you. I just wanted to make someone smile with this or feel not so lonely. I'm no inspiration, just someone who hit rock bottom and want to make sure no one else gets there.

Wow thank you. I am just a guy with an idea and fifty bucks to spend. I can't tell you how true it is that the little things are where we find the most joy. I am thankful everyday to those that forced me to get help. I know now i have something to offer the world, just like everyone else.
It might still be your problem but it does not mean you have to solve it yourself. Please get help. Just some support is sometimes all it takes.
I would love one :) and thank you :)
Fantastic and thank you for the compliment!! :)
Awesome to see this going global :) Wish you nothing but the best too
Thank you for continuing the message. Keep fighting against your disease and best of luck to you too
Thanks :)
It can be and i can't stay away from the dank memes either :)
Always happy to help and thank you :)
Welcome! :)
I would love to make the front page and spread the positivity :)
I'm crying reading all of your responses :) And thank you i will. Same to you :)
Thanks! I hope just one person smiles and i know doing this would have been worth it :)
I would love to :)
Fantastic! I know it is so tempting to get that skin you wanted, but the satisfaction of getting that thank you message back makes it worth it. And congrats on the tourney win!

This is the true reason i wanted to start this. I knew that someone out there just needed to know they weren't alone and people cared. I hope you are feeling better. Don't thank me. Thank you for not giving up on life. I am sitting here with tears cuz i know if i would have died i wouldn't have posted this and it wouldve died with me. I had a really rough day before you posted this. I would to play and talk with you sometime :)
First step to recovery is admitting you have a problem. Fantastic for making a change. Keep it up :)
Thanks i will message you later. Would love to play!

I hope i have helped. Really focus and try with your treatment, never be "too cool" for anything, cuz you will be surprised who you become friendly with and what can help. Stick with the treatment and you can definitely make it out :)
I'm so happy to hear that you are already doing this! And you are right it makes the game so much more fun. :)
Thank you and don't feel the need to match at all. Just be positive and that would be reward enough. :)
then it was worth posting already :)
Thanks :)
Thanks i hope it does too :)
Thank you for the compliment. Even greater thanks for taking a stand against verbal abuse and for helping spread the Amumu Project :)
Happy to post :). And you described it incredibly well. :)
Thanks! I am not alone with this just the guy who had the idea :)
I would love if Riot or Pro players would spread this just to get the idea around. But Riot has their reasons, so I've learned just try and do my part. But i love your passion :)
Glad to hear you enjoy the idea and i hope you are doing better. And money isnt the point here, positivity is. It is far greater and more valuable anyway! :)
Oh boy, what have i done? ;)
Fantastic! Thanks for joining and being a part of this! I honestly didn't want or expect anyone to match me. Just have people be nicer to each other. :)
Just want to help others. Thanks for the support! :)
Today and this weekend was rough, but I'm hanging in there thank you :)
